title: 从二叉搜索树到更大和树 (Binary Search Tree to Greater Sum Tree)
content: 思路: // @Title: 从二叉搜索树到更大和树 (Binary Search Tree to Greater Sum Tree) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-16 18:48:58 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 40.2 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { int prev=0; public TreeNode bstToGst(TreeNode root) { if(root==null){ return null; } bstToGst(root.right); root.val+=prev; prev=root.val; bstToGst(root.left); return root; } }
